description: The games will be played every 15 days on the Pokerstars platform.
The inscription in each day will be 20,000 fictitious chips. Remember to have available balance.
Each game will start with 10,000 chips and the speed will be turbo without breaks.
There will be a late registration of 2 levels (10 min) in case someone gets confused.
At the end of the 10 games, the first 3 places will be awarded (prize yet to be defined).
It is totally forbidden to insult or make obscene comments in the game chat.
If a registered player does not attend the game, he will automatically score 0 regardless of the position in which he is left.
